<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Smoke Screen Snare](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1520)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Quest for the Frozen Flame</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=105" />
<trait label="Snare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=146" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 80</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

You create a snare that releases a dense cloud of smoke when a creature enters the square, filling a specified area. All creatures within that area are [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4), and all other creatures are concealed to them. The smoke lasts for 1 minute or until dispersed by a strong wind.

**Craft Requirements** Supply a [lesser smokestick](/Equipment.aspx?ID=135) for the lesser snare or a greater smokestick for the greater snare.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 1"
pfs=""
>
Smoke Screen Snare (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 80</row>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The smoke fills the snare's square and all adjacent squares.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 7"
pfs=""
>
Smoke  Screen Snare (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 80</row>

**Price** 60 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The smoke fills a 20-foot burst centered on the snare's square.
